page.title: 08OLD PEOPLE IN PENTIRE
page.content: We asked 2 elderly residents what their everyday life was like. One is an old age pensioner which means she is over 60 years old and finds it hard to do her house work. The people from St. Johns Ambulance Brigade help her in her house. The St. Johns Ambulance group are a voluntary organ- ization with people trained in First Aid and Care. She gets up each morn- ing, has breakfast and watches "Break- fast Television" for 2.5 hours. Later on she goes to see her friends in Newquay and plays cards. She goes to town to get her shopping such as biscuits, drink, cake and meat. Another resident's hobby is to look after his garden, when he gets time, and to help other pensioners with theirs.
